Title: Chillar Party
Writer: Vikas Bahl (screenplay), Vijay Maurya, Nitesh Tiwari
Actors: Aarav Khanna, Chinmay Chandraunshuh, Divji Handa, Irfan Khan
Plot: A gang of innocent but feisty kids who lead carefree lives in Chandan Nagar colony takes on the big bad world of politics when one of their friend's life is endangered.
